PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ShiplockDesignCriteria
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties common to the definition of design criteria of all occurrences of IfcMarineFacility with the predefined type set to SHIPLOCK.

PropertyDef.Name: MaximumUpstreamNavigableWaterLevel
PropertyDef.Definition: Design maximum upstream water level for the lock complex

PropertyDef.Name: MinimumUpstreamNavigableWaterLevel
PropertyDef.Definition: Design minimum upstream water level for the lock complex

PropertyDef.Name: MaximumDownstreamNavigableWaterLevel
PropertyDef.Definition: Design maximum downstream water level for the lock complex

PropertyDef.Name: MinimumDownstreamNavigableWaterLevel
PropertyDef.Definition: Design minimum downstream water level for the lock complex

PropertyDef.Name: UpstreamMaintenanceWaterLevel
PropertyDef.Definition: Design maximum upstream water level for the lock complex

PropertyDef.Name: DownstreamMaintenanceWaterLevel
PropertyDef.Definition: Design minimum upstream water level for the lock complex

PropertyDef.Name: UpstreamFloodWaterLevel
PropertyDef.Definition: Design maximum upstream water level for the lock complex

PropertyDef.Name: DownstreamFloodWaterLevel
PropertyDef.Definition: the design minimum upstream water level for the lock complex
